Constructs a {{tt|month_weekday}} object that stores the {{ltt|cpp/chrono/month}} {{c|m}} and the {{ltt|cpp/chrono/weekday_indexed}} {{c|wdi}}.

===Notes===
A more convenient way to construct a {{tt|month_weekday}} is with {{c|operator/}}, e.g., {{c|std::chrono::April/std::chrono::Sunday[2]}}.
